title: Did a 1979 Pakistan Airline Advertisement Show an Airliner’s Shadow on the World Trade Center?
subtitle: A 1979 Pakistan airline advertisement shows the shadow of a jetliner on the World Trade Center.  Is it a real image, or a post/9-11 fabrication?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A 1979 Pakistan airline advertisement showed the shadow of a jetliner on the World Trade Center.
